Posts.Content: Since my mastectomy and now che mo I have been using aloe vera gel (pure) on my body .Sometimes I add lavender essential oil. if its irritating or spotty I add some German Chamomile essential oil. I use idrop to 5mls of Aloe vera gel. 1% solution half normal strenght. I have very soft skin now.
